name: Verify invalid registration by the user due to invalid e-mail

steps.name: Given the user is on the sign up page

When the invalid invalid input for the e-mail  is given in the e-mail field "user
@domain.com"
Then create an account button is clicked
And the invalid e-mail message should be displayed to the user properly
